wawuniyawa ukkulamkulam pradeshaye 13 hawiridi pasal dariyak apayojanaya kara ghathanaya kara thibenawa.pasugiya 16 wanida pasal yamata nohaki bawa pawasamin mema dariya niwase nathara wi athi athara pasuwa age sahodaraya pasal nimawi niwasata pamini awasthawe aya niwase gela walalagena siti ayuru nirikshanaya kara thibuna.dariyage sirura parikshakala wawuniyawa maha rohale adhikarana waidya niladhariwarayeku mema maranaya sambandhayen saka mathukirimath samaga wawuniyawa polisiye aparadha wimarshana anshaya parikshana arammbha kala athara ee anuwa pasugiya 18 wanada sidukala pashchath marana parikshanayedi heli wuye mema dariya barapathala lesa lingika apayojanayata lakkara ghathanayakara athi bawayi.

amarapura maha sangha sabhawe sabhapathi athipujya kotugoda dhammawasa maha nahimi, ramanynya maha nikaye anunayaka pujya girambae aananda maha nahimi, narahenpita abhayaramadhipathi pujya muruththettuwe aananda nahimi athulu maha sangharathnayada eksath jathika pakshaye parlimenthu, palath sabha manthriwarun ha palath palana niyojithayan rasakda mada kolambaa keselwaththa ha hambanthota pradeshawalin pamini wishala pirisak da mema awasthawata ekwuha.
rathnapura siwali kridanganaya idiripitadi kolambain pamini pirisath, awashesha skutar karuwanuth ekata ek wu pasuwa nila washayen nagrak charikawa arambauneya.

minisunge kuriru hasthayata hasuwana ahinsaka aadaraniya robo themawa mage pelambaawima wiya. 1938 juni 10wana dina mama kathawa liyaddi (ow mama mage dina satahan gana boho se salakanawa) mage uthsahaya wuye robowan kerehi patakayage karunawa yomu karawimatayi.

dekayi “ kiyala uththara denna puluwan tharamata hakiyawak enawa ,
dayasiri ape pakshaye inna kota kiyapu aanduwe waradi eya giya kiyala hadanna baha.
masa kihipayakata pasu ma athulu nawaka sisun 7 denekuta jawipe panthi 5 pawathwuye upali jayawira(pasu kalaye manel mahaththaya lesin hadinwu) wisini.
me warthawa wasara 31 k, enam 1930 wasara dakwa akhandawa raka gannata eya samath wiya.
eheth mewara janapathiwaranaya thulin ee mahathma gathiya boho aath wi gos athi bawak daknata labe.
